After playing this game for a few hours I have to say that I have experienced many times where rotating from one side of the map to another just takes too long. So I will kindly ask this one question that I'm sure many players have asked aswell. Valve please make the cars driveable. I hate rotating from long on dust 2 all the way to B site when the CT spawn is well protected by the opponents. I see that there are some vehicles scattered around on some of the maps and it would be very helpful being able to hop in one of those and drift my way into B site blasting Running in the 90's and hopefully turning some enemies into roadkill, just like when I drive near schoolzones on my way to McDonalds. Thank you valve.
